topic.title: Editing Attributes in Author Mode Using Form Controls

keywords.indexterm: Editing Form Controls edit form control attributes in Author mode

body.p: You can edit attributes in Author mode by using the Attributes View, but also allows you to edit attribute and element text values in-place, directly in the Author mode, using form-based controls. includes various built-in form controls and you can also implement custom form controls for your specific needs.
As a working example, the bundled samples project contains a file called personal.xml that allows you to edit attributes in-place using some of the default form control implementations.
